price: Ese kwakirwa gutyo si ko kwiza, cyangwa (kwakirizwa) igiti cya Zaqum (kigira imbuto zirura cyane, ni byo byiza)?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
